CONFIRM_HIDE.en: Are you sure you want to hide?

CONFIRM_SHOW.en: Are you sure you want to show?

CONFIRM_ACTIVATE.en: Are you sure you want to activate?

CONFIRM_DEACTIVATE.en: Are you sure you want to deactivate?

CONFIRM_CANCEL.en: Are you sure you want to cancel?

REQUIRE_CHANGE_PASSWORD.en:
You're using temporary password.
Please change the password.

PASSWORD_CHANGED.en:
Your password has changed.
Please login with the new password again.

ERROR_NEW_PASSWORD.en: Password should be at least 8 characters

DELETE_CONFIRM.en:
Are you sure you want to delete?
You cannot undo.

SAVE_APPOINTMENT_TIME_CONFIRM.en:
Save changes?
Changes will be applied immediately.

DELETE_TREATMENT_ITEM_CONFIRM.en: Delete the treatment item? It won't change unless you save.
DELETE_TREATMENT_ITEM_CONFIRM.kr: 상담/진료항목을 삭제할까요? 변경사항을 저장하기 전에는 반영되지 않습니다.

DELETE_ALIMTALK_CONFIRM.en:
Are you sure you want to delete the Alimtalk?
You will no longer be able to use Alimtalk.
DELETE_ALIMTALK_CONFIRM.kr:
정말로 알림톡 설정을 해제하시겠습니까?
해제시, 알림톡 전송은 더 이상 사용이 불가능합니다.

POST_SMS_NOTIFICATION_CONFIRM.en: Among %s, for whom agreed receiving %s, (targets: %s), post SMS notification?
POST_SMS_NOTIFICATION_CONFIRM.kr: 전송대상 고객 %s명 중, %s 수신에 동의한 %s명에게 문자를 전송(예약)하시겠습니까?

POST_SMS_NOTIFICATION_DONE.en: You just created (reserved) %s SMS Notification. You can see those histories in 'SMS Notifications' menu.
POST_SMS_NOTIFICATION_DONE.kr: 총 %s명에게 문자를 전송(예약) 하였습니다. 문자 전송(예약) 내역은 '문자 전송내역 조회' 화면에서 확인할 수 있습니다.

MODAL_DEACTIVATE_CLINIC_INPUT_NAME.en: Input name of the clinic you're about to deactivate

DEACTIVATE_WARNING_TITLE.en: ※ Read below very carefully before continue

DEACTIVATE_WARNING_BODY.en:
1. Every account connected to that client will be deleted.

2. All customer, appointment, ETC info will be deleted.

3. However, CMS, SMS request won't be automatically canceled/refunded.
DEACTIVATE_WARNING_BODY.kr:
1. 계약해지 시, 해당 클라이언트의 모든 계정은 접속불가 및 삭제처리 됩니다.

2. 클라이언트가 입력한 고객정보, 예약정보 등의 모든 정보가 삭제됩니다.

3. 단, 월 관리비 청구 및 문자충전금은 자동으로 취소/환불되지 않습니다.

CONFIRM_REMOVED.en:
The items above will be removed.
Are you sure you want to confirm?
